author: fanf
msg: Fix byte range content length calculations, which should fix the reported
problems with byteserved PDFs. I've had a couple of reports that things
work OK with this patch but more testing would be good.

author: fanf
msg: it's hot and i'm wearing a black t-shirt

author: rbb
msg: ap_send_fd should not be sending an EOS bucket, so we should remove any
trace of that possibility from the code.  First of all, there is nothing
that says you can only send one file bucket in a response, and second,
even if a handler sends a file, nothing says that it can't add text before

author: wrowe
msg: With a few final edits to make the language clearer (thank you Greg),
